overview:
Anthony Bodin co-founded our company. Immediately prior to founding our company, he co-founded Exinda Networks, a VC backed company specializing in network acceleration appliances Head Quartered in Boston. Prior to that Anthony was a founding director of IT & e Ltd which is dual listed on the Australian Stock Exchange and the London Stock Exchange AIM. His first foray into the Internet was in 1993, where he co-founded Internet Access Australia which was subsequently acquired by US Internet Service Provider Asia Online in 1999.

He has considerable international experience whilst working in the UK through the early 90s, with frequent international travel and holds a Diploma of Engineering (Electrical).
